basics.name: Tyler Frasca
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Currently a junior majoring in Computer Science and Engineering looking to gain knowledge and experience in Software Development. Eager to dive further into the industry in Application Programming or Web Development. Experience in programming and I.T. with a passion for coding, learning and solving problems.

highlights: Postgres, Ruby on Rails, and React stack
Learning, formally documenting, and teaching an in-house programming language
Quality Assurance and billable Professional Services work in the language
Help desk and hands-on troubleshooting across large, integrated computer and slot machine networks
Responsibility of monitoring and maintaining systems on two separate properties
Heading and participating in property-wide projects and tasks
Tasked with creation of new documentation as well as updating legacy documentation
Working alone and as a team on a wide variety of hardware, software, and networking issues
Passing on and picking up work orders through a daily communication log with other team members
Moderate control over end-user network and applications access for security and auditing regulations
